titleStmt.title: Armilla aurea, id est, Miranda series causarum et salutis & damnationis iuxta verbum Dei Eius synopsin continet annexa tabula.
titleStmt.author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Series causarum salutis & damnationis.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
